thread.title: New Apple TV is Probably a Games Console
thread.title_full: New Apple TV is Probably a Games Console

title: New Apple TV is Probably a Games Console
text:
Get Business & Technology Alerts 
8 Sep 2015 06:10 AM EST 
The next round of competition for the PS4 and Xbox One probably wonâ€™t come from Nintendo and its NX console. Instead, it looks likely to be Apple vying for your gaming dollars with the next generation of the Apple TV hardware. Apple always hits the ground running when it releases a new generation of hardware. It has a well established ecosystem of mobile and at-home hardware solutions backed up by an ever growing app store. The move to add console-like gaming to the Apple TV makes a lot of sense because everything except the games are already in place. The next Apple TV will be announced on Wednesday
